ClassDesc: An object that configures how to copy or move a file. Objects of this type may be used with the @B_java#nio#file#Files#copy_E@, @B_java#nio#file#Files#copy_E@ and @B_java#nio#file#Files#move_E@ methods to configure how a file is copied or moved.
